summary: Susan St. James helps Peter Fonda, an ex-convict who goes after the country music star who stole his song and made it a hit.
cast: Peter Fonda|Susan Saint James|John Crawford|James T. Callahan|Michael Lerner|Steven Fromholz|Richard Lockmiller|Matt Clark|Jan Rita Cobler|Gene Rader|Curtis Harris|Jerry Greene|Dave Helfert|Jeffrey Friedman|James N. Harrell|Nic Christie|Steve Goodwin|R.C. Keene|Janet Quist|Tommy Splittgerber
title: El blues de los proscritos
